name: Guild of Ascension - Gameplay Demo
description:
This is a Gameplay demo for Guild of Ascension, we hope to collect early feedback on the core gameplay, and the unique mix of Tactics and Action we have achieve in our game.

Feel free to send us any feedback you have at this link  https://www.whileoneproductions.com/feedback

and please do understand that the game is still in the early stage of development :) 
But I hope you still enjoy the game ! 


As a quick presentation of the game, here is one paragraph of the description you can find in the official website (www.whileoneproductions.com) :

"Guild of Ascension" is an Active Time Tactics (ATT) game that mixed Tactical Turn Based game, with an Action RPG twist to it.

You play a group of Ascenders that try to climb the Tower of Goddess, a mystical place filled by summon monsters that provide mana crystal once defeated. Those crystal are the last source of magic left in the world. It is rumor that the Goddess is awaiting at the top of the Tower to welcome the group who had overcome all the challenges and grants them with the ultimate gift.
